roleset.name: ask a question (of a listener)
roleset.note: QUESTION-V NOTES: Former file, question-v.01, based on sentences in financial subcorpus. The former file encompassed allverb senses. Member of VNcls interrogate-37.1.3. (from question.01-v)
QUESTION-N NOTES: Former file, question-n.01, based on question-v.01. Framed by Katie. (from question.01-n)

example.name: question-v: with hearer
example.text: Mary questioned John about his whereabouts last night.

example.name: question-n: Example with arg 2
example.text: I have a question for Mr. Laband

example.name: question-n: arg 0 and 1
example.text: an attorney 's question about whether we would go after attorney's fees, and that is different from actually doing it ,althoughwe reserve that right
example.arg: about whether we would go after attorney 's fees , and that is different from actually doing it , although we reservethat right

example.name: question-n: Lots of arg ms
example.text: Our web question of the week

example.name: question-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: Your question about the New York Times

example.name: questioning-n: Arg0,2
example.text: Due in large part to Patrick's thoroughness, and his questioning of the plaintiff's doctors, the plaintiff was awardeddamages of only $3000.

roleset.name: out-of-the-question
roleset.note: QUESTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on eventive-nouns-00060. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie. (from question.02-n)

role.descr: thing that is out of the question

example.name: question-n: Example with arg 2 (and an arg 1 that cannot be annotated because of the verb)
example.text: renewing military aid had been considered out of the question for civilians,

example.name: question-n: This is often what you'll see. You cannot annotate the thing that is 'out of the question' in these cases because of the intervening verb
example.text: Sometimes repairs are out of the question .

roleset.name: have doubts, be dubious
roleset.note: QUESTIONABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ data,question-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls interrogate-37.1.3. (from questionable.01-j) This frame file has been reframed following negotiations between Martha, Julia, Tim, Katie, and Ulf. The former .01 roleset included both'ask a question' and 'have doubts' senses, and has been split into .01 and .03 rolesets. Reframing allows 'questionable' to be aliased to only the 'have doubts' sense.

example.name: questionable-j: arg1
example.text: Prosecutors in Port St. Lucie, Fla., said the victim's identification of McIntyre as the suspect was questionable.
example.arg: the victim's identification of McIntyre as the suspect

example.name: questionable-j: args0, 1
example.text: If the right was questionable by the legislature, the right of the legislature to question it could not be disputed;
